7. sue is training for a marathon. her training includes a run every saturday starting with a 
run of 5 km on the first saturday. each saturday she increases the length of her run from 
the previous saturday by 2 km.
 
(a) show that on the 4th saturday of training she runs 11 km.
 (1) 
 
(b) find an expression, in terms of n, for the length of her training run on the nth   
saturday. 
(2) 
 
(c) show that the total distance she runs on saturdays in n weeks of training is n(n + 4) km. 
(3)
 
on the n th saturday sue runs 43 km.
 
(d) find the value of n.
(2)
 
(e) find the total distance, in km, sue runs on saturdays in n weeks of training.
(2)
